   6654  f07f
   6655  f07f				   clearscreen
   6656  f07f		       a2 0b		      ldx	#(WZONECOUNT-1)
   6657  f081		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6658  f083				   clearscreenloop
   6659  f083		       95 65		      sta	dlend,x
   6660  f085		       ca		      dex
   6661  f086		       10 fb		      bpl	clearscreenloop
   6662  f088		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6663  f08a		       8d ad 01 	      sta	valbufend	; clear the bcd value buffer
   6664  f08d		       8d ae 01 	      sta	valbufendsave
   6665  f090		       60		      rts
   6666  f091
   6667  f091				   restorescreen
   6668  f091		       a2 0b		      ldx	#(WZONECOUNT-1)
   6669  f093		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6670  f095				   restorescreenloop
   6671  f095		       b5 82		      lda	dlendsave,x
   6672  f097		       95 65		      sta	dlend,x
   6673  f099		       ca		      dex
   6674  f09a		       10 f9		      bpl	restorescreenloop
   6675  f09c		       ad ae 01 	      lda	valbufendsave
   6676  f09f		       8d ad 01 	      sta	valbufend
   6677  f0a2		       60		      rts
   6678  f0a3
   6679  f0a3				   savescreen
   6680  f0a3		       a2 0b		      ldx	#(WZONECOUNT-1)
   6681  f0a5				   savescreenloop
   6682  f0a5		       b5 65		      lda	dlend,x
   6683  f0a7		       95 82		      sta	dlendsave,x
   6684  f0a9		       ca		      dex
   6685  f0aa		       10 f9		      bpl	savescreenloop
   6686  f0ac		       ad ad 01 	      lda	valbufend
   6687  f0af		       8d ae 01 	      sta	valbufendsave
   6688  f0b2				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   6689  f0b2				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   6690  f0b2				  -	      beq	savescreenrts
   6691  f0b2				  -	      lda	#1
   6692  f0b2				  -	      sta	doublebufferbufferdirty
   6693  f0b2				  -savescreenrts
   6694  f0b2					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   6695  f0b2		       60		      rts
   6696  f0b3
   6697  f0b3				   drawscreen
   6698  f0b3
   6699  f0b3				  -	      ifconst	interrupthold
   6700  f0b3				  -	      lda	#$FF
   6701  f0b3				  -	      sta	interrupthold	; if the user called drawscreen, we're ready for interrupts
   6702  f0b3					      endif
   6703  f0b3
   6704  f0b3		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6705  f0b5		       85 42		      sta	temp1	; not B&W if we're here...
   6706  f0b7
   6707  f0b7				   drawscreenwait
   6708  f0b7		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   6709  f0b9		       d0 fc		      bne	drawscreenwait	; make sure the visible screen isn't being drawn
   6710  f0bb
   6711  f0bb							;restore some registers in case the game changed them mid-screen...
   6712  f0bb		       ad 07 21 	      lda	sCTRL
   6713  f0be		       05 42		      ora	temp1
   6714  f0c0		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL
   6715  f0c2		       ad 0b 21 	      lda	sCHARBASE
   6716  f0c5		       85 34		      sta	CHARBASE
   6717  f0c7
   6718  f0c7							;ensure all of the display list is terminated...
   6719  f0c7		       20 31 f1 	      jsr	terminatedisplaylist
   6720  f0ca
   6721  f0ca					      ifnconst	pauseroutineoff
   6722  f0ca		       20 d5 f0 	      jsr	pauseroutine
   6723  f0cd					      endif		; pauseroutineoff
   6724  f0cd
   6725  f0cd							; Make sure the visible screen has *started* before we exit. That way we can rely on drawscreen
   6726  f0cd							; delaying a full frame, but still allowing time for basic calculations.
   6727  f0cd				   visiblescreenstartedwait
   6728  f0cd		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   6729  f0cf		       f0 fc		      beq	visiblescreenstartedwait
   6730  f0d1				   visiblescreenstartedwaitdone
   6731  f0d1		       ce 3e 21 	      dec	frameslost	; ; this gets balanced with an "inc frameslost" by an NMI at the top of the screen
   6732  f0d4		       60		      rts
   6733  f0d5
   6734  f0d5					      ifnconst	pauseroutineoff
   6735  f0d5							; check to see if pause was pressed and released
   6736  f0d5				   pauseroutine
   6737  f0d5		       ad b3 01 	      lda	pausedisable
   6738  f0d8		       d0 47		      bne	leavepauseroutine
   6739  f0da		       a9 08		      lda	#8
   6740  f0dc		       2c 82 02 	      bit	SWCHB
   6741  f0df		       f0 22		      beq	pausepressed
   6742  f0e1
   6743  f0e1				  -	      ifconst	SNES0PAUSE
   6744  f0e1				  -	      lda	port0control
   6745  f0e1				  -	      cmp	#11
   6746  f0e1				  -	      bne	skipsnes0pause
   6747  f0e1				  -	      lda	snesdetected0
   6748  f0e1				  -	      beq	skipsnes0pause
   6749  f0e1				  -	      lda	snes2atari0hi
   6750  f0e1				  -	      and	#%00010000
   6751  f0e1				  -	      beq	pausepressed
   6752  f0e1				  -skipsnes0pause
   6753  f0e1					      endif
   6754  f0e1				  -	      ifconst	SNES1PAUSE
   6755  f0e1				  -
   6756  f0e1				  -	      lda	port1control
   6757  f0e1				  -	      cmp	#11
   6758  f0e1				  -	      bne	skipsnes1pause
   6759  f0e1				  -	      lda	snesdetected1
   6760  f0e1				  -	      beq	skipsnes1pause
   6761  f0e1				  -	      lda	snes2atari1hi
   6762  f0e1				  -	      and	#%00010000
   6763  f0e1				  -	      beq	pausepressed
   6764  f0e1				  -skipsnes1pause
   6765  f0e1					      endif
   6766  f0e1				  -	      ifconst	SNESNPAUSE
   6767  f0e1				  -	      ldx	snesport
   6768  f0e1				  -	      lda	port0control,x
   6769  f0e1				  -	      cmp	#11
   6770  f0e1				  -	      bne	skipsnesNpause
   6771  f0e1				  -	      lda	snesdetected0,x
   6772  f0e1				  -	      beq	skipsnesNpause
   6773  f0e1				  -	      lda	snes2atari0hi,x
   6774  f0e1				  -	      and	#%00010000
   6775  f0e1				  -	      beq	pausepressed
   6776  f0e1				  -skipsnesNpause
   6777  f0e1					      endif
   6778  f0e1				  -	      ifconst	MULTIBUTTONPAUSE
   6779  f0e1				  -	      ldx	#1
   6780  f0e1				  -multibuttonpauseloop
   6781  f0e1				  -	      lda	port0control,x
   6782  f0e1				  -	      cmp	#11
   6783  f0e1				  -	      bcc	multibuttonpauseloopbottom
   6784  f0e1				  -	      lda	sINPT1,x
   6785  f0e1				  -	      and	#1
   6786  f0e1				  -	      beq	pausepressed
   6787  f0e1				  -multibuttonpauseloopbottom
   6788  f0e1				  -	      dex
   6789  f0e1				  -	      bpl	multibuttonpauseloop
   6790  f0e1					      endif		; MULTIBUTTONPAUSE
   6791  f0e1
   6792  f0e1							;pause isn't pressed
   6793  f0e1		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6794  f0e3		       8d ac 01 	      sta	pausebuttonflag	; clear pause hold state in case its set
   6795  f0e6
   6796  f0e6							;check if we're in an already paused state
   6797  f0e6		       ad 00 21 	      lda	pausestate
   6798  f0e9		       f0 36		      beq	leavepauseroutine	; nope, leave
   6799  f0eb
   6800  f0eb		       c9 01		      cmp	#1	; last frame was the start of pausing
   6801  f0ed		       f0 2b		      beq	enterpausestate2	; move from state 1 to 2
   6802  f0ef
   6803  f0ef		       c9 02		      cmp	#2
   6804  f0f1		       f0 34		      beq	carryonpausing
   6805  f0f3
   6806  f0f3							;pausestate must be >2, which means we're ending an unpause
   6807  f0f3		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6808  f0f5		       8d ac 01 	      sta	pausebuttonflag
   6809  f0f8		       8d 00 21 	      sta	pausestate
   6810  f0fb		       ad 07 21 	      lda	sCTRL
   6811  f0fe		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL
   6812  f100		       4c 21 f1 	      jmp	leavepauseroutine
   6813  f103
   6814  f103				   pausepressed
   6815  f103							;pause is pressed
   6816  f103		       ad ac 01 	      lda	pausebuttonflag
   6817  f106		       c9 ff		      cmp	#$ff
   6818  f108		       f0 1d		      beq	carryonpausing
   6819  f10a
   6820  f10a							;its a new press, increment the state
   6821  f10a		       ee 00 21 	      inc	pausestate
   6822  f10d
   6823  f10d							;silence volume at the start and end of pausing
   6824  f10d		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6825  f10f		       85 19		      sta	AUDV0
   6826  f111		       85 1a		      sta	AUDV1
   6827  f113
   6828  f113				  -	      ifconst	pokeysupport
   6829  f113				  -	      ldy	#7
   6830  f113				  -pausesilencepokeyaudioloop
   6831  f113				  -	      sta	(pokeybase),y
   6832  f113				  -	      dey
   6833  f113				  -	      bpl	pausesilencepokeyaudioloop
   6834  f113					      endif		; pokeysupport
   6835  f113
   6836  f113		       a9 ff		      lda	#$ff
   6837  f115		       8d ac 01 	      sta	pausebuttonflag
   6838  f118		       d0 0d		      bne	carryonpausing
   6839  f11a
   6840  f11a				   enterpausestate2
   6841  f11a		       a9 02		      lda	#2
   6842  f11c		       8d 00 21 	      sta	pausestate
   6843  f11f		       d0 06		      bne	carryonpausing
   6844  f121				   leavepauseroutine
   6845  f121		       ad 07 21 	      lda	sCTRL
   6846  f124		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL
   6847  f126		       60		      rts
   6848  f127				   carryonpausing
   6849  f127				  -	      ifconst	.pause
   6850  f127				  -	      jsr	.pause
   6851  f127					      endif		; .pause
   6852  f127		       ad 07 21 	      lda	sCTRL
   6853  f12a		       09 80		      ora	#%10000000	; turn off colorburst during pause...
   6854  f12c		       85 3c		      sta	CTRL
   6855  f12e		       4c d5 f0 	      jmp	pauseroutine
   6856  f131					      endif		; pauseroutineoff
   6857  f131
   6858  f131
   6859  f131				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   6860  f131				  -skipterminatedisplaylistreturn
   6861  f131				  -	      rts
   6862  f131					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   6863  f131				   terminatedisplaylist
   6864  f131				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   6865  f131				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   6866  f131				  -	      bne	skipterminatedisplaylistreturn	; double-buffering runs it's own DL termination code
   6867  f131					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   6868  f131				   terminatedisplaybuffer
   6869  f131							;add DL end entry on each DL
   6870  f131		       a2 0b		      ldx	#(WZONECOUNT-1)
   6871  f133				   dlendloop
   6872  f133				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   6873  f133				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   6874  f133				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   6875  f133					      else		; !VSCROLL
   6876  f133		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that this sprite starts in
   6877  f136					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   6878  f136				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   6879  f136				  -	      clc
   6880  f136				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   6881  f136					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   6882  f136		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   6883  f138				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   6884  f138				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   6885  f138					      else		; !VSCROLL
   6886  f138		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   6887  f13b					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   6888  f13b				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   6889  f13b				  -	      adc	#0
   6890  f13b					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   6891  f13b		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   6892  f13d		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x
   6893  f13f		       a9 00		      lda	#$00
   6894  f141				   dlendmoreloops
   6895  f141		       c8		      iny
   6896  f142		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   6897  f144				  -	      ifconst	FRAMESKIPGLITCHFIXWEAK
   6898  f144				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ+1
   6899  f144				  -	      beq	dlendthiszonedone
   6900  f144				  -	      iny
   6901  f144				  -	      iny
   6902  f144				  -	      iny
   6903  f144				  -	      iny
   6904  f144				  -	      iny
   6905  f144				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   6906  f144				  -dlendthiszonedone
   6907  f144					      endif	FRAMESKIPGLITCHFIXWEAK
   6908  f144				  -	      ifconst	FRAMESKIPGLITCHFIX
   6909  f144				  -	      iny
   6910  f144				  -	      iny
   6911  f144				  -	      iny
   6912  f144				  -	      iny
   6913  f144				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ-1
   6914  f144				  -	      bcc	dlendmoreloops
   6915  f144					      endif		; FRAMESKIPGLITCHFIX
   6916  f144		       ca		      dex
   6917  f145		       10 ec		      bpl	dlendloop
   6918  f147
   6919  f147					      ifnconst	pauseroutineoff
   6920  f147		       20 d5 f0 	      jsr	pauseroutine
   6921  f14a					      endif		; pauseroutineoff
   6922  f14a		       60		      rts
   6923  f14b
   6924  f14b				   uninterruptableroutines
   6925  f14b							; this is for routines that must happen off the visible screen, each frame.
   6926  f14b
   6927  f14b				  -	      ifconst	AVOXVOICE
   6928  f14b				  -	      jsr	serviceatarivoxqueue
   6929  f14b					      endif
   6930  f14b				  -	      ifconst	MEGA7800SUPPORT
   6931  f14b				  -	      ldx	#1
   6932  f14b				  -mega7800polling
   6933  f14b				  -	      lda	port0control,x
   6934  f14b				  -	      cmp	#12	; mega7800
   6935  f14b				  -	      bne	mega7800handlercheck2
   6936  f14b				  -	      jsr	mega7800handler
   6937  f14b				  -	      jmp	mega7800handlerdone
   6938  f14b				  -mega7800handlercheck2
   6939  f14b				  -	      ifconst	MULTIBUTTON
   6940  f14b				  -	      cmp	#1	; proline
   6941  f14b				  -	      bne	mega7800handlerdone
   6942  f14b				  -	      lda	framecounter
   6943  f14b				  -	      eor	#7	; avoid the same frame as the snes2atari probe
   6944  f14b				  -	      and	#63
   6945  f14b				  -	      bne	mega7800handlerdone
   6946  f14b				  -	      lda	#12
   6947  f14b				  -	      sta	port0control,x
   6948  f14b				  -	      jsr	mega7800handler
   6949  f14b				  -	      endif		; MULTIBUTTON
   6950  f14b				  -mega7800handlerdone
   6951  f14b				  -	      dex
   6952  f14b				  -	      bpl	mega7800polling
   6953  f14b					      endif		; MEGA7800SUPPORT
   6954  f14b
   6955  f14b		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6956  f14d		       8d b7 01 	      sta	palfastframe
   6957  f150		       8d b6 01 	      sta	ntscslowframe
   6958  f153		       ac b5 01 	      ldy	palframes
   6959  f156		       c8		      iny
   6960  f157		       ae 09 21 	      ldx	paldetected	; 0=ntsc 1=pal
   6961  f15a		       f0 06		      beq	ntsc2palskipcheck
   6962  f15c				   pal2ntscskipcheck
   6963  f15c		       c0 05		      cpy	#5	; every 5th frame, add a frame
   6964  f15e		       d0 0b		      bne	palframeskipdone
   6965  f160		       f0 04		      beq	frameskipdo
   6966  f162				   ntsc2palskipcheck
   6967  f162		       c0 06		      cpy	#6	; every 6th frame, drop a frame
   6968  f164		       d0 05		      bne	palframeskipdone
   6969  f166				   frameskipdo
   6970  f166		       fe b6 01 	      inc	ntscslowframe,x
   6971  f169		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   6972  f16b				   palframeskipdone
   6973  f16b		       8c b5 01 	      sty	palframes
   6974  f16e				   skippalframeadjusting
   6975  f16e
   6976  f16e				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   6977  f16e				  -			; We normally run the servicesong routine from the top-screen interrupt, but if it
   6978  f16e				  -			; happens to interrupt the scheduling of a sound effect in the game code, we skip it.
   6979  f16e				  -			; If that happens, we try again here. Chances are very small we'll run into the same
   6980  f16e				  -			; problem twice, and if we do, we just drop a musical note or two.
   6981  f16e				  -	      lda	sfxschedulemissed
   6982  f16e				  -	      beq	servicesongwasnotmissed
   6983  f16e				  -	      jsr	servicesong
   6984  f16e				  -servicesongwasnotmissed
   6985  f16e					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   6986  f16e
   6987  f16e				  -	      ifconst	RMT
   6988  f16e				  -	      ifnconst	RMTPALSPEED
   6989  f16e				  -	      ifnconst	RMTOFFSPEED
   6990  f16e				  -	      ifconst	PAUSESILENT
   6991  f16e				  -	      lda	pausestate
   6992  f16e				  -	      bne	skiprasterupdate2
   6993  f16e				  -	      endif
   6994  f16e				  -	      lda	palfastframe
   6995  f16e				  -	      beq	skiprasterupdate2
   6996  f16e				  -	      lda	rasterpause
   6997  f16e				  -	      beq	skiprasterupdate2
   6998  f16e				  -	      jsr	RASTERMUSICTRACKER+3
   6999  f16e				  -skiprasterupdate2
   7000  f16e				  -	      endif
   7001  f16e				  -	      endif
   7002  f16e					      endif
   7003  f16e
   7004  f16e		       60		      rts
   7005  f16f
   7006  f16f				   serviceatarivoxqueue
   7007  f16f				  -	      ifconst	AVOXVOICE
   7008  f16f				  -	      lda	voxlock
   7009  f16f				  -	      bne	skipvoxprocessing	; the vox is in the middle of speech address update
   7010  f16f				  -skipvoxqueuesizedec
   7011  f16f				  -	      jmp	processavoxvoice
   7012  f16f				  -skipvoxprocessing
   7013  f16f				  -	      rts
   7014  f16f				  -
   7015  f16f				  -processavoxvoice
   7016  f16f				  -	      ifconst	HSSUPPORT
   7017  f16f				  -			; ** we skip speech if hi-score is on and no vox was detected
   7018  f16f				  -			; ** this is to avoid later collision with snes pads.
   7019  f16f				  -	      lda	hsdevice
   7020  f16f				  -	      and	#2
   7021  f16f				  -	      beq	processavoxvoicereturn
   7022  f16f				  -	      endif		; HSSUPPORT
   7023  f16f				  -	      lda	avoxenable
   7024  f16f				  -	      bne	avoxfixport
   7025  f16f				  -	      SPKOUT	tempavox
   7026  f16f				  -	      rts
   7027  f16f				  -avoxfixport
   7028  f16f				  -	      lda	#0	; restore the port to all bits as inputs...
   7029  f16f				  -	      sta	CTLSWA
   7030  f16f				  -	      rts
   7031  f16f				  -silenceavoxvoice
   7032  f16f				  -	      SPEAK	avoxsilentdata
   7033  f16f				  -processavoxvoicereturn
   7034  f16f				  -	      rts
   7035  f16f				  -avoxsilentdata
   7036  f16f				  -	      .byte	31,255
   7037  f16f					      else
   7038  f16f		       60		      rts
   7039  f170					      endif		; AVOXVOICE
   7040  f170
   7041  f170				   prolinebuttonpadhandler
   7042  f170				  -	      ifconst	MULTIBUTTON
   7043  f170				  -	      lda	framecounter
   7044  f170				  -	      and	#63
   7045  f170				  -	      bne	jbhandlercont1
   7046  f170				  -	      jsr	setonebuttonmode
   7047  f170				  -	      lda	#11
   7048  f170				  -	      sta	port0control,x
   7049  f170				  -	      jsr	snes2atari_signal_go
   7050  f170				  -	      lda	port0control,x
   7051  f170				  -	      cmp	#1	; check if it's still a proline
   7052  f170				  -	      beq	jbhandlercont1
   7053  f170				  -	      jmp	buttonreadloopreturn

   7055  f170				  -	      lda	#2
   7056  f170				  -	      sta	multibuttoncount0,x
   7057  f170					      endif		; MULTIBUTTON
   7058  f170				   joybuttonpadhandler
   7059  f170		       ad 31 21 	      lda	sSWCHA	; clear previous dirs for this pad, from
   7060  f173		       1d c2 f1 	      ora	SWCHA_DIRMASK,x	; our sSWCHA nibble.
   7061  f176		       8d 31 21 	      sta	sSWCHA
   7062  f179		       ad 80 02 	      lda	SWCHA	; load th actual joystick dirs, ensuring
   7063  f17c		       1d c3 f1 	      ora	SWCHA_DIRMASK+1,x	; we don't change the other nibble.
   7064  f17f		       2d 31 21 	      and	sSWCHA
   7065  f182		       8d 31 21 	      sta	sSWCHA
   7066  f185				   joybuttonhandler
   7067  f185		       8a		      txa
   7068  f186		       0a		      asl
   7069  f187		       a8		      tay
   7070  f188		       b9 08 00 	      lda	INPT0,y
   7071  f18b		       4a		      lsr
   7072  f18c							;ora #%00111111
   7073  f18c		       9d 02 21 	      sta	sINPT1,x
   7074  f18f		       b9 09 00 	      lda	INPT1,y
   7075  f192		       29 80		      and	#%10000000
   7076  f194		       1d 02 21 	      ora	sINPT1,x
   7077  f197		       9d 02 21 	      sta	sINPT1,x
   7078  f19a
   7079  f19a		       b5 0c		      lda	INPT4,x
   7080  f19c		       30 19		      bmi	.skip1bjoyfirecheck
   7081  f19e							;one button joystick is down
   7082  f19e		       49 80		      eor	#%10000000
   7083  f1a0		       9d 02 21 	      sta	sINPT1,x
   7084  f1a3
   7085  f1a3		       ad b1 01 	      lda	joybuttonmode

   7090  f1b1		       8d b1 01 	      sta	joybuttonmode

   7092  f1b7				   .skip1bjoyfirecheck

   7096  f1bf		       4c 57 f0 	      jmp	buttonreadloopreturn

   7101  f1c5
   7102  f1c5				   gunbuttonhandler		; outside of the conditional, so our button handler LUT is valid
   7103  f1c5				  -	      ifconst	LIGHTGUNSUPPORT
   7104  f1c5				  -	      cpx	#0
   7105  f1c5				  -	      bne	secondportgunhandler

   7157  f1e1		       c5		      .byte.b	<gunbuttonhandler	; 02=lightgun

   7171  f1ee		       30 fc		      bmi	drawwait	; make sure the visible screen isn't being drawn
   7172  f1f0		       60		      rts

   7195  f203					      endif
   7196  f203				   servicesfxchannels
   7197  f203				  -	      ifconst	PAUSESILENT
   7198  f203				  -	      lda	pausestate
   7199  f203				  -	      beq	servicesfxchannels_1
   7200  f203				  -	      rts
   7201  f203				  -servicesfxchannels_1
   7202  f203					      endif
   7203  f203		       a2 ff		      ldx	#255
   7204  f205				   servicesfxchannelsloop
   7205  f205		       e8		      inx
   7206  f206					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   7207  f206		       e0 02		      cpx	#2
   7208  f208				  -	      else
   7209  f208				  -	      cpx	#1
   7210  f208					      endif
   7211  f208		       f0 f8		      beq	servicesfxchannelsdone
   7212  f20a
   7213  f20a		       a5 de		      lda	sfxschedulelock	; =1 if locked
   7214  f20c		       d0 f4		      bne	servicesfxchannelsdone	; exit if a pointer may be mid-way change
   7215  f20e
   7216  f20e		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   7217  f210		       85 dc		      sta	inttemp5
   7218  f212		       15 50		      ora	sfx1pointhi,x
   7219  f214		       f0 ef		      beq	servicesfxchannelsloop
   7220  f216		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   7221  f218		       85 dd		      sta	inttemp6
   7222  f21a
   7223  f21a		       b5 58		      lda	sfx1tick,x
   7224  f21c		       f0 05		      beq	servicesfx_cont1	; this chunk is over, load the next!
   7225  f21e		       d6 58		      dec	sfx1tick,x	; frame countdown is non-zero, subtract one
   7226  f220		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   7227  f223				   servicesfx_cont1
   7228  f223
   7229  f223		       a0 01		      ldy	#1	; check to see if they're changing the frame countdown
   7230  f225		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   7231  f227		       c9 10		      cmp	#$10
   7232  f229		       d0 1b		      bne	servicesfx_cont1a
   7233  f22b		       a0 02		      ldy	#2
   7234  f22d		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   7235  f22f		       95 56		      sta	sfx1frames,x	; change the frame countdown
   7236  f231		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   7237  f233		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   7238  f235							; advance the sound pointer by 3...
   7239  f235		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   7240  f237		       18		      clc
   7241  f238		       69 03		      adc	#3
   7242  f23a		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   7243  f23c		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   7244  f23e		       69 00		      adc	#0
   7245  f240		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   7246  f242							; and then fetch another sample for this channel...
   7247  f242		       ca		      dex
   7248  f243		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   7249  f246				   servicesfx_cont1a
   7250  f246
   7251  f246		       b5 56		      lda	sfx1frames,x	; set the frame countdown for this sound chunk
   7252  f248		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   7253  f24a
   7254  f24a		       b5 52		      lda	sfx1priority,x	; decrease the sound's priority if its non-zero
   7255  f24c		       f0 02		      beq	servicesfx_cont2
   7256  f24e		       d6 52		      dec	sfx1priority,x
   7257  f250				   servicesfx_cont2
   7258  f250
   7259  f250		       a0 00		      ldy	#0	; play the sound
   7260  f252		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   7261  f254		       85 d8		      sta	inttemp1
   7262  f256
   7263  f256				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   7264  f256				  -	      lda	sfx1notedata,x
   7265  f256				  -	      beq	exitmusictracker	; exit if this isn't a pitched instrument
   7266  f256				  -	      ldy	#0
   7267  f256				  -	      sty	inttemp2
   7268  f256				  -	      clc
   7269  f256				  -	      adc	(inttemp5),y
   7270  f256				  -	      asl		; x2
   7271  f256				  -	      tay
   7272  f256				  -	      lda	tiatrackeroctavenotes,y
   7273  f256				  -	      sta	AUDC0,x
   7274  f256				  -	      iny
   7275  f256				  -	      lda	tiatrackeroctavenotes,y
   7276  f256				  -	      sta	AUDF0,x
   7277  f256				  -	      ldy	#1
   7278  f256				  -	      jmp	sfxvolumeentrypt
   7279  f256				  -exitmusictracker
   7280  f256				  -	      lda	inttemp1
   7281  f256					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   7282  f256
   7283  f256		       18		      clc
   7284  f257		       75 54		      adc	sfx1poffset,x	; take into account any pitch modification
   7285  f259		       95 17		      sta	AUDF0,x
   7286  f25b		       c8		      iny
   7287  f25c		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   7288  f25e		       95 15		      sta	AUDC0,x
   7289  f260		       85 d9		      sta	inttemp2
   7290  f262		       c8		      iny
   7291  f263				   sfxvolumeentrypt
   7292  f263				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
   7293  f263				  -	      lda	tiavolume
   7294  f263				  -	      asl
   7295  f263				  -	      asl
   7296  f263				  -	      asl
   7297  f263				  -	      asl
   7298  f263				  -	      sta	fourbitfadevalueint
   7299  f263					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
   7300  f263		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   7301  f265				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
   7302  f265				  -	      jsr	fourbitfadeint
   7303  f265					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
   7304  f265		       95 19		      sta	AUDV0,x
   7305  f267		       c9 10		      cmp	#$10
   7306  f269		       b0 19		      bcs	sfxsoundloop	; AUDV0>$0F means the sound is looped while priority is active
   7307  f26b
   7308  f26b		       05 d9		      ora	inttemp2
   7309  f26d		       05 d8		      ora	inttemp1	; check if F|C|V=0
   7310  f26f		       f0 23		      beq	zerosfx	; if so, we're at the end of the sound.
   7311  f271
   7312  f271				   advancesfxpointer
   7313  f271							; advance the pointer to the next sound chunk
   7314  f271		       c8		      iny
   7315  f272		       84 da		      sty	inttemp3
   7316  f274		       18		      clc
   7317  f275		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   7318  f277		       65 da		      adc	inttemp3
   7319  f279		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   7320  f27b		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   7321  f27d		       69 00		      adc	#0
   7322  f27f		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   7323  f281		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   7324  f284
   7325  f284				   sfxsoundloop
   7326  f284		       48		      pha
   7327  f285		       b5 52		      lda	sfx1priority,x
   7328  f287		       d0 04		      bne	sfxsoundloop_carryon
   7329  f289		       68		      pla		; fix the stack before we go
   7330  f28a		       4c 71 f2 	      jmp	advancesfxpointer
   7331  f28d				   sfxsoundloop_carryon
   7332  f28d		       68		      pla
   7333  f28e		       29 f0		      and	#$F0
   7334  f290		       4a		      lsr
   7335  f291		       4a		      lsr
   7336  f292		       4a		      lsr
   7337  f293		       4a		      lsr
   7338  f294
   7339  f294				   zerosfx
   7340  f294		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   7341  f296		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   7342  f298		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   7343  f29a		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   7344  f29d
   7345  f29d
   7346  f29d				   schedulesfx
   7347  f29d							; called with sfxinstrumentlo=<data sfxinstrumenthi=>data sfxpitchoffset=pitch-offset sfxnoteindex=note index
   7348  f29d		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   7349  f29f				  -	      ifconst	pokeysupport
   7350  f29f				  -	      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   7351  f29f				  -	      beq	scheduletiasfx	; drums have undefined instrument
   7352  f29f				  -	      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   7353  f29f				  -	      cmp	#$20	; POKEY?
   7354  f29f				  -	      bne	scheduletiasfx
   7355  f29f				  -	      jmp	schedulepokeysfx
   7356  f29f					      endif
   7357  f29f				   scheduletiasfx
   7358  f29f							;cmp #$10 ; TIA?
   7359  f29f							;beq continuescheduletiasfx
   7360  f29f							; rts ; unhandled!!!
   7361  f29f				   continuescheduletiasfx
   7362  f29f					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   7363  f29f		       a5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi
   7364  f2a1		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx1	;if channel 1 is idle, use it
   7365  f2a3		       a5 51		      lda	sfx2pointhi
   7366  f2a5		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx2	;if channel 2 is idle, use it
   7367  f2a7							; Both channels are scheduled.
   7368  f2a7		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   7369  f2a9		       f0 06		      beq	skipscheduledrums
   7370  f2ab		       a0 01		      ldy	#1
   7371  f2ad		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   7372  f2af		       d0 01		      bne	interruptsfx
   7373  f2b1				   skipscheduledrums
   7374  f2b1		       60		      rts		; the new sound has 0 priority and both channels are busy. Skip playing it.
   7375  f2b2				   interruptsfx
   7376  f2b2							;Compare which active sound has a lower priority. We'll interrupt the lower one.
   7377  f2b2		       a5 52		      lda	sfx1priority
   7378  f2b4		       c5 53		      cmp	sfx2priority
   7379  f2b6		       b0 04		      bcs	schedulesfx2
   7380  f2b8					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   7381  f2b8
   7382  f2b8				   schedulesfx1
   7383  f2b8		       a2 00		      ldx	#0	; channel 1
   7384  f2ba					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   7385  f2ba		       f0 02		      beq	skipschedulesfx2
   7386  f2bc				   schedulesfx2
   7387  f2bc		       a2 01		      ldx	#1	; channel 2
   7388  f2be				   skipschedulesfx2
   7389  f2be					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   7390  f2be
   7391  f2be				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   7392  f2be				  -	      lda	sfxnoteindex
   7393  f2be				  -	      bpl	skipdrumkitoverride
   7394  f2be				  -	      and	#$7F	; subtract 128
   7395  f2be				  -	      sec
   7396  f2be				  -	      sbc	#4	; drums start at 132, i.e. octave 10
   7397  f2be				  -	      asl
   7398  f2be				  -	      tay
   7399  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   7400  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumentlo
   7401  f2be				  -	      iny
   7402  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   7403  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumenthi
   7404  f2be				  -	      lda	#0
   7405  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxnoteindex	; and tell the driver it's a non-pitched instrument
   7406  f2be				  -skipdrumkitoverride
   7407  f2be					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   7408  f2be		       a0 01		      ldy	#1	; get priority and sound-resolution (in frames)
   7409  f2c0		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   7410  f2c2		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   7411  f2c4		       c8		      iny
   7412  f2c5		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   7413  f2c7		       95 56		      sta	sfx1frames,x
   7414  f2c9		       a5 e0		      lda	sfxinstrumentlo
   7415  f2cb		       18		      clc
   7416  f2cc		       69 03		      adc	#3
   7417  f2ce		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   7418  f2d0		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   7419  f2d2		       69 00		      adc	#0
   7420  f2d4		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   7421  f2d6		       a5 e2		      lda	sfxpitchoffset
   7422  f2d8		       95 54		      sta	sfx1poffset,x
   7423  f2da		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   7424  f2dc		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   7425  f2de		       a5 e3		      lda	sfxnoteindex
   7426  f2e0		       95 cd		      sta	sfx1notedata,x
   7427  f2e2		       60		      rts
   7428  f2e3
   7429  f2e3				   plotsprite
   7430  f2e3					      ifnconst	NODRAWWAIT
   7431  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7432  f2e3				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   7433  f2e3				  -	      bne	skipplotspritewait
   7434  f2e3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7435  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7436  f2e3				  -	      lda	#$41
   7437  f2e3				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7438  f2e3					      endif
   7439  f2e3				   plotspritewait
   7440  f2e3		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   7441  f2e5		       d0 fc		      bne	plotspritewait
   7442  f2e7				   skipplotspritewait
   7443  f2e7				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7444  f2e7				  -	      lda	#$0
   7445  f2e7				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7446  f2e7					      endif
   7447  f2e7					      endif
   7448  f2e7
   7449  f2e7							;arguments:
   7450  f2e7							; temp1=lo graphicdata
   7451  f2e7							; temp2=hi graphicdata
   7452  f2e7							; temp3=palette | width byte
   7453  f2e7							; temp4=x
   7454  f2e7							; temp5=y
   7455  f2e7							; temp6=mode
   7456  f2e7		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7457  f2e9		       4a		      lsr		; 2 - Divide by 8 or 16
   7458  f2ea		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   7459  f2eb		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   7460  f2ec					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   7461  f2ec		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   7462  f2ed					      endif
   7463  f2ed
   7464  f2ed		       aa		      tax
   7465  f2ee
   7466  f2ee					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
   7467  f2ee
   7468  f2ee							; the next block allows for vertical masking, and ensures we don't overwrite non-DL memory
   7469  f2ee
   7470  f2ee		       c9 0c		      cmp	#WZONECOUNT
   7471  f2f0
   7472  f2f0		       90 0a		      bcc	continueplotsprite1	; the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
   7473  f2f2							; otherwise, check to see if the bottom half is in zone 0...
   7474  f2f2
   7475  f2f2					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   7476  f2f2		       c9 0f		      cmp	#15
   7477  f2f4				  -	      else
   7478  f2f4				  -	      cmp	#31
   7479  f2f4					      endif
   7480  f2f4
   7481  f2f4		       d0 05		      bne	exitplotsprite1
   7482  f2f6		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
   7483  f2f8		       4c 31 f3 	      jmp	continueplotsprite2
   7484  f2fb				   exitplotsprite1
   7485  f2fb		       60		      rts
   7486  f2fc
   7487  f2fc				   continueplotsprite1
   7488  f2fc					      endif
   7489  f2fc
   7490  f2fc				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7491  f2fc				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7492  f2fc				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7493  f2fc					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7494  f2fc		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that this sprite starts in
   7495  f2ff					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7496  f2ff				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7497  f2ff				  -	      clc
   7498  f2ff				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7499  f2ff					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7500  f2ff		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   7501  f301				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7502  f301				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7503  f301					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7504  f301		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7505  f304					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7506  f304				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7507  f304				  -	      adc	#0
   7508  f304					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7509  f304		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   7510  f306
   7511  f306							;Create DL entry for upper part of sprite
   7512  f306
   7513  f306		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7514  f308
   7515  f308				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7516  f308				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7517  f308				  -	      beq	checkcontinueplotsprite2
   7518  f308				  -continueplotsprite1a
   7519  f308					      endif
   7520  f308
   7521  f308		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
   7522  f30a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;Low byte of data address
   7523  f30c
   7524  f30c					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7525  f30c		       c8		      iny
   7526  f30d		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
   7527  f30f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7528  f311				  -	      else
   7529  f311				  -	      iny
   7530  f311				  -	      sty	temp8
   7531  f311					      endif
   7532  f311
   7533  f311		       c8		      iny
   7534  f312
   7535  f312		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7536  f314		       29 0f		      and	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)
   7537  f316		       c9 01		      cmp	#1	; clear carry if our sprite is just in this zone
   7538  f318		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
   7539  f31a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7540  f31c
   7541  f31c		       c8		      iny
   7542  f31d		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7543  f31f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7544  f321
   7545  f321		       c8		      iny
   7546  f322		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7547  f324		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7548  f326
   7549  f326		       c8		      iny
   7550  f327		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
   7551  f329
   7552  f329				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
   7553  f329				  -	      iny
   7554  f329				  -	      lda	#0
   7555  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7556  f329					      endif
   7557  f329
   7558  f329				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7559  f329				  -	      ldy	temp8
   7560  f329				  -	      lda	temp6
   7561  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7562  f329					      endif
   7563  f329
   7564  f329				   checkcontinueplotsprite2
   7565  f329
   7566  f329		       90 33		      bcc	doneSPDL	;branch if the sprite was fully in the last zone
   7567  f32b
   7568  f32b							;Create DL entry for lower part of sprite
   7569  f32b
   7570  f32b		       e8		      inx		;Next region
   7571  f32c
   7572  f32c					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
   7573  f32c		       e0 0c		      cpx	#WZONECOUNT
   7574  f32e
   7575  f32e		       90 01		      bcc	continueplotsprite2	; the second half of the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
   7576  f330		       60		      rts
   7577  f331				   continueplotsprite2
   7578  f331					      endif
   7579  f331
   7580  f331				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7581  f331				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7582  f331				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7583  f331					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7584  f331		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to next DL
   7585  f334					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7586  f334				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7587  f334				  -	      clc
   7588  f334				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7589  f334					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7590  f334		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   7591  f336				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7592  f336				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7593  f336					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7594  f336		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7595  f339					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7596  f339				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7597  f339				  -	      adc	#0
   7598  f339					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7599  f339		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   7600  f33b		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7601  f33d
   7602  f33d				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7603  f33d				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7604  f33d				  -	      bne	continueplotsprite2a
   7605  f33d				  -	      rts
   7606  f33d				  -continueplotsprite2a
   7607  f33d					      endif
   7608  f33d
   7609  f33d		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
   7610  f33f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7611  f341
   7612  f341					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7613  f341		       c8		      iny
   7614  f342		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
   7615  f344		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7616  f346				  -	      else
   7617  f346				  -	      iny
   7618  f346				  -	      sty	temp8
   7619  f346					      endif
   7620  f346
   7621  f346		       c8		      iny
   7622  f347
   7623  f347		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7624  f349		       0b 0f		      anc	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)	; undocumented. A=A&IMM, then move bit 7 into carry
   7625  f34b		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
   7626  f34d		       e9 0f		      sbc	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)	; start at the DMA hole. -1 because carry is clear
   7627  f34f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7628  f351
   7629  f351		       c8		      iny
   7630  f352
   7631  f352		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7632  f354		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7633  f356
   7634  f356		       c8		      iny
   7635  f357
   7636  f357		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7637  f359		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7638  f35b
   7639  f35b		       c8		      iny
   7640  f35c		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
   7641  f35e
   7642  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
   7643  f35e				  -	      iny
   7644  f35e				  -	      lda	#0
   7645  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7646  f35e					      endif
   7647  f35e
   7648  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7649  f35e				  -	      ldy	temp8
   7650  f35e				  -	      lda	temp6
   7651  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7652  f35e					      endif
   7653  f35e
   7654  f35e				   doneSPDL
   7655  f35e		       60		      rts
   7656  f35f
   7657  f35f				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7658  f35f				  -			; x3 table for fast DLL parsing
   7659  f35f				  -Xx3
   7660  f35f				  -	      .byte	0,3,6,9,12,15,18,21,24,27
   7661  f35f				  -	      .byte	30,33,36,39,42,45,48,51,54,57
   7662  f35f				  -	      .byte	60,63,66,69,72,75,78,81,84,87
   7663  f35f				  -maskscrollsprite
   7664  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%11000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),0,160	; 5*2 + 32*3 = 106 cycles
   7665  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   7666  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   7667  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   7668  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%01000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),16,160	; 5*2 + 16*3 =  58 cycles
   7669  f35f				  -			; MAX	============ 467 cycles
   7670  f35f				  -			; MIN	============  59 cycles
   7671  f35f				  -maskscrollspriteend
   7672  f35f					      endif		; VSCROLL
   7673  f35f
   7674  f35f				   lockzonex
   7675  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   7676  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   7677  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7678  f35f				  -	      beq	lockzonexreturn	; the zone is either stuffed or locked. abort!
   7679  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   7680  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7681  f35f				  -	      clc
   7682  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7683  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7684  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   7685  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7686  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7687  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
   7688  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7689  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   7690  f35f				  -	      iny
   7691  f35f				  -	      lda	#0
   7692  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7693  f35f				  -	      dey
   7694  f35f				  -	      tya
   7695  f35f				  -	      ldy	#(DLLASTOBJ-1)
   7696  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7697  f35f				  -	      iny
   7698  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
   7699  f35f				  -lockzonexreturn
   7700  f35f				  -	      rts
   7701  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
   7702  f35f				   unlockzonex
   7703  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   7704  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   7705  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7706  f35f				  -	      bne	unlockzonexreturn	; if the zone isn't stuffed, it's not locked. abort!
   7707  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   7708  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7709  f35f				  -	      clc
   7710  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7711  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7712  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   7713  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7714  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7715  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
   7716  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7717  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   7718  f35f				  -	      dey
   7719  f35f				  -	      lda	(dlpnt),y
   7720  f35f				  -	      tay
   7721  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
   7722  f35f				  -unlockzonexreturn
   7723  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
   7724  f35f		       60		      rts
   7725  f360
   7726  f360				   plotcharloop
   7727  f360							; ** read from a data indirectly pointed to from temp8,temp9
   7728  f360							; ** format is: lo_data, hi_data, palette|width, x, y
   7729  f360							; ** format ends with lo_data | hi_data = 0
   7730  f360
   7731  f360				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7732  f360				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   7733  f360				  -	      bne	skipplotcharloopwait
   7734  f360					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7735  f360				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7736  f360				  -	      lda	#$61
   7737  f360				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7738  f360					      endif
   7739  f360				   plotcharloopwait
   7740  f360		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   7741  f362		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharloopwait
   7742  f364				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7743  f364				  -	      lda	#0
   7744  f364				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7745  f364					      endif
   7746  f364				   skipplotcharloopwait
   7747  f364				   plotcharlooploop
   7748  f364		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   7749  f366		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7750  f368		       85 42		      sta	temp1
   7751  f36a		       c8		      iny
   7752  f36b		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7753  f36d		       85 43		      sta	temp2
   7754  f36f		       05 42		      ora	temp1
   7755  f371		       d0 01		      bne	plotcharloopcontinue
   7756  f373							;the pointer=0, so return
   7757  f373		       60		      rts
   7758  f374				   plotcharloopcontinue
   7759  f374		       c8		      iny
   7760  f375		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7761  f377		       85 44		      sta	temp3
   7762  f379		       c8		      iny
   7763  f37a		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7764  f37c		       85 45		      sta	temp4
   7765  f37e		       c8		      iny
   7766  f37f		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7767  f381							;sta temp5 ; not needed with our late entry.
   7768  f381		       20 9a f3 	      jsr	plotcharactersskipentry
   7769  f384		       a5 49		      lda	temp8
   7770  f386		       18		      clc
   7771  f387		       69 05		      adc	#5
   7772  f389		       85 49		      sta	temp8
   7773  f38b		       a5 4a		      lda	temp9
   7774  f38d		       69 00		      adc	#0
   7775  f38f		       85 4a		      sta	temp9
   7776  f391		       4c 64 f3 	      jmp	plotcharlooploop
   7777  f394
   7778  f394				   plotcharacters
   7779  f394				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7780  f394				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   7781  f394				  -	      bne	skipplotcharacterswait
   7782  f394					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7783  f394				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7784  f394				  -	      lda	#$41
   7785  f394				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7786  f394					      endif
   7787  f394				   plotcharacterswait
   7788  f394		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   7789  f396		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharacterswait
   7790  f398				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7791  f398				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7792  f398					      endif
   7793  f398				   skipplotcharacterswait
   7794  f398							;arguments:
   7795  f398							; temp1=lo charactermap
   7796  f398							; temp2=hi charactermap
   7797  f398							; temp3=palette | width byte
   7798  f398							; temp4=x
   7799  f398							; temp5=y
   7800  f398
   7801  f398		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7802  f39a
   7803  f39a				   plotcharactersskipentry
   7804  f39a
   7805  f39a							;ifconst ZONEHEIGHT
   7806  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 16
   7807  f39a							; and #$0F
   7808  f39a							; endif
   7809  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 8
   7810  f39a							; and #$1F
   7811  f39a							; endif
   7812  f39a							;else
   7813  f39a							; and #$0F
   7814  f39a							;endif
   7815  f39a
   7816  f39a		       aa		      tax
   7817  f39b
   7818  f39b				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7819  f39b				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7820  f39b				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7821  f39b					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7822  f39b		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
   7823  f39e					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7824  f39e				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7825  f39e				  -	      clc
   7826  f39e				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7827  f39e					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7828  f39e		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   7829  f3a0				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7830  f3a0				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7831  f3a0					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7832  f3a0		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7833  f3a3					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7834  f3a3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7835  f3a3				  -	      adc	#0
   7836  f3a3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7837  f3a3		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   7838  f3a5
   7839  f3a5							;Create DL entry for the characters
   7840  f3a5
   7841  f3a5		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7842  f3a7
   7843  f3a7				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7844  f3a7				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7845  f3a7				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacters
   7846  f3a7				  -	      rts
   7847  f3a7				  -continueplotcharacters
   7848  f3a7					      endif
   7849  f3a7
   7850  f3a7		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
   7851  f3a9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
   7852  f3ab
   7853  f3ab		       c8		      iny
   7854  f3ac		       ad 06 21 	      lda	charactermode
   7855  f3af		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
   7856  f3b1
   7857  f3b1		       c8		      iny
   7858  f3b2		       a5 43		      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
   7859  f3b4		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
   7860  f3b6
   7861  f3b6		       c8		      iny
   7862  f3b7		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7863  f3b9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
   7864  f3bb
   7865  f3bb		       c8		      iny
   7866  f3bc		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7867  f3be		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
   7868  f3c0
   7869  f3c0		       c8		      iny
   7870  f3c1		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
   7871  f3c3		       60		      rts
   7872  f3c4
   7873  f3c4
   7874  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	plotvalueonscreen
   7875  f3c4				  -plotcharacterslive
   7876  f3c4				  -			; a version of plotcharacters that draws live and minimally disrupts the screen...
   7877  f3c4				  -
   7878  f3c4				  -			;arguments:
   7879  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
   7880  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
   7881  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
   7882  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
   7883  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
   7884  f3c4				  -
   7885  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7886  f3c4				  -
   7887  f3c4				  -	      tax
   7888  f3c4				  -
   7889  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7890  f3c4				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7891  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7892  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
   7893  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
   7894  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7895  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7896  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7897  f3c4				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7898  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7899  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   7900  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7901  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7902  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
   7903  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7904  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7905  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7906  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
   7907  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7908  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   7909  f3c4				  -
   7910  f3c4				  -			;Create DL entry for the characters
   7911  f3c4				  -
   7912  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7913  f3c4				  -
   7914  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7915  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7916  f3c4				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacterslive
   7917  f3c4				  -	      rts
   7918  f3c4				  -continueplotcharacterslive
   7919  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7920  f3c4				  -
   7921  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
   7922  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
   7923  f3c4				  -
   7924  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7925  f3c4				  -			; we don't add the second byte yet, since the charmap could briefly
   7926  f3c4				  -			; render without a proper character map address, width, or position.
   7927  f3c4				  -	      lda	charactermode
   7928  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
   7929  f3c4				  -
   7930  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7931  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
   7932  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
   7933  f3c4				  -
   7934  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7935  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7936  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
   7937  f3c4				  -
   7938  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7939  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7940  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
   7941  f3c4				  -
   7942  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7943  f3c4				  -	      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
   7944  f3c4				  -
   7945  f3c4				  -	      rts
   7946  f3c4					      endif		;plotcharacterslive
   7947  f3c4
   7948  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUE
   7949  f3c4				  -plotvalue
   7950  f3c4				  -			; calling 7800basic command:
   7951  f3c4				  -			; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
   7952  f3c4				  -			; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
   7953  f3c4				  -			;
   7954  f3c4				  -			; asm sub arguments:
   7955  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
   7956  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
   7957  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
   7958  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
   7959  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
   7960  f3c4				  -			; temp6=number of digits
   7961  f3c4				  -			; temp7=lo variable
   7962  f3c4				  -			; temp8=hi variable
   7963  f3c4				  -			; temp9=character mode
   7964  f3c4				  -
   7965  f3c4				  -plotdigitcount =	temp6
   7966  f3c4				  -
   7967  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   7968  f3c4				  -	      ldx	temp5
   7969  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   7970  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7971  f3c4				  -	      bne	carryonplotvalue
   7972  f3c4				  -	      rts
   7973  f3c4				  -carryonplotvalue
   7974  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7975  f3c4				  -
   7976  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
   7977  f3c4				  -	      tay
   7978  f3c4				  -	      ldx	valbufend
   7979  f3c4				  -
   7980  f3c4				  -	      lda	plotdigitcount
   7981  f3c4				  -	      and	#1
   7982  f3c4				  -	      beq	pvnibble2char
   7983  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
   7984  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x	; just in case we skip this digit
   7985  f3c4				  -	      beq	pvnibble2char_skipnibble
   7986  f3c4				  -
   7987  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char
   7988  f3c4				  -			; high nibble...
   7989  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   7990  f3c4				  -	      and	#$f0
   7991  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7992  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7993  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7994  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   7995  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7996  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7997  f3c4				  -
   7998  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7999  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   8000  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   8001  f3c4				  -	      inx
   8002  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   8003  f3c4				  -
   8004  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char_skipnibble
   8005  f3c4				  -			; low nibble...
   8006  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   8007  f3c4				  -	      and	#$0f
   8008  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   8009  f3c4				  -	      asl
   8010  f3c4				  -	      endif
   8011  f3c4				  -	      clc
   8012  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   8013  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   8014  f3c4				  -	      inx
   8015  f3c4				  -	      iny
   8016  f3c4				  -
   8017  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   8018  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2char
   8019  f3c4				  -
   8020  f3c4				  -			;point to the start of our valuebuffer
   8021  f3c4				  -	      clc
   8022  f3c4				  -	      lda	#<VALBUFFER
   8023  f3c4				  -	      adc	valbufend
   8024  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp1
   8025  f3c4				  -	      lda	#>VALBUFFER
   8026  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
   8027  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp2
   8028  f3c4				  -
   8029  f3c4				  -			;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
   8030  f3c4				  -	      stx	valbufend
   8031  f3c4				  -
   8032  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
   8033  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacters
   8034  f3c4				  -	      else
   8035  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
   8036  f3c4				  -	      endif
   8037  f3c4				  -
   8038  f3c4					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUE
   8039  f3c4
   8040  f3c4
   8041  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
   8042  f3c4				  -plotdigitcount =	temp6
   8043  f3c4				  -plotvalueextra
   8044  f3c4				  -			; calling 7800basic command:
   8045  f3c4				  -			; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
   8046  f3c4				  -			; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
   8047  f3c4				  -			;
   8048  f3c4				  -			; asm sub arguments:
   8049  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
   8050  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
   8051  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
   8052  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
   8053  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
   8054  f3c4				  -			; temp6=number of digits
   8055  f3c4				  -			; temp7=lo variable
   8056  f3c4				  -			; temp8=hi variable
   8057  f3c4				  -
   8058  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
   8059  f3c4				  -	      tay
   8060  f3c4				  -	      ldx	valbufend
   8061  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
   8062  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   8063  f3c4				  -	      endif
   8064  f3c4				  -
   8065  f3c4				  -	      lda	plotdigitcount
   8066  f3c4				  -	      and	#1
   8067  f3c4				  -
   8068  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
   8069  f3c4				  -
   8070  f3c4				  -pvnibble2charextra
   8071  f3c4				  -			; high nibble...
   8072  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   8073  f3c4				  -	      and	#$f0
   8074  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   8075  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   8076  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   8077  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   8078  f3c4				  -	      endif
   8079  f3c4				  -	      clc
   8080  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   8081  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   8082  f3c4				  -	      inx
   8083  f3c4				  -
   8084  f3c4				  -			; second half of the digit
   8085  f3c4				  -	      clc
   8086  f3c4				  -	      adc	#1
   8087  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   8088  f3c4				  -	      inx
   8089  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   8090  f3c4				  -
   8091  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
   8092  f3c4				  -			; low nibble...
   8093  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   8094  f3c4				  -	      and	#$0f
   8095  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   8096  f3c4				  -	      asl
   8097  f3c4				  -	      endif
   8098  f3c4				  -	      asl
   8099  f3c4				  -
   8100  f3c4				  -	      clc
   8101  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   8102  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   8103  f3c4				  -	      inx
   8104  f3c4				  -
   8105  f3c4				  -	      clc
   8106  f3c4				  -	      adc	#1
   8107  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   8108  f3c4				  -	      inx
   8109  f3c4				  -	      iny
   8110  f3c4				  -
   8111  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   8112  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2charextra
   8113  f3c4				  -
   8114  f3c4				  -			;point to the start of our valuebuffer
   8115  f3c4				  -	      clc
   8116  f3c4				  -	      lda	#<VALBUFFER
   8117  f3c4				  -	      adc	valbufend
   8118  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp1
   8119  f3c4				  -	      lda	#>VALBUFFER
   8120  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
   8121  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp2
   8122  f3c4				  -
   8123  f3c4				  -			;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
   8124  f3c4				  -	      stx	valbufend
   8125  f3c4				  -
   8126  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
   8127  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacters
   8128  f3c4				  -	      else
   8129  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
   8130  f3c4				  -	      endif
   8131  f3c4					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
   8132  f3c4
   8133  f3c4				   boxcollision
   8134  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	BOXCOLLISION
   8135  f3c4				  -			; the worst case cycle-time for the code below is 43 cycles.
   8136  f3c4				  -			; unfortunately, prior to getting here we've burned 44 cycles in argument setup. eep!
   8137  f3c4				  -
   8138  f3c4				  -			;__boxx1 = accumulator
   8139  f3c4				  -			;__boxy1 = y
   8140  f3c4				  -__boxw1    =	temp3
   8141  f3c4				  -__boxh1    =	temp4
   8142  f3c4				  -
   8143  f3c4				  -__boxx2    =	temp5
   8144  f3c4				  -__boxy2    =	temp6
   8145  f3c4				  -__boxw2    =	temp7
   8146  f3c4				  -__boxh2    =	temp8
   8147  f3c4				  -
   8148  f3c4				  -DoXCollisionCheck
   8149  f3c4				  -			;lda __boxx1 ; skipped. already in the accumulator
   8150  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
   8151  f3c4				  -	      bcs	X1isbiggerthanX2	;2/3
   8152  f3c4				  -X2isbiggerthanX1
   8153  f3c4				  -			; carry is clear
   8154  f3c4				  -	      adc	__boxw1	;3
   8155  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
   8156  f3c4				  -	      bcs	DoYCollisionCheck	;3/2
   8157  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6 - carry clear, no collision
   8158  f3c4				  -X1isbiggerthanX2
   8159  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
   8160  f3c4				  -	      sbc	__boxw2	;3
   8161  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
   8162  f3c4				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
   8163  f3c4				  -DoYCollisionCheck
   8164  f3c4				  -	      tya		; 2 ; use to be "lda __boxy1"
   8165  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
   8166  f3c4				  -	      bcs	Y1isbiggerthanY2	;3/2
   8167  f3c4				  -Y2isbiggerthanY1
   8168  f3c4				  -			; carry is clear
   8169  f3c4				  -	      adc	__boxh1	;3
   8170  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
   8171  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
   8172  f3c4				  -Y1isbiggerthanY2
   8173  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
   8174  f3c4				  -	      sbc	__boxh2	;3
   8175  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
   8176  f3c4				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
   8177  f3c4				  -yesboxcollision
   8178  f3c4				  -	      sec		;2
   8179  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
   8180  f3c4				  -noboxcollision
   8181  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
   8182  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
   8183  f3c4					      endif		; BOXCOLLISION
   8184  f3c4
   8185  f3c4				   randomize
   8186  f3c4		       a5 40		      lda	rand
   8187  f3c6		       4a		      lsr
   8188  f3c7		       26 41		      rol	rand16
   8189  f3c9		       90 02		      bcc	noeor
   8190  f3cb		       49 b4		      eor	#$B4
   8191  f3cd				   noeor
   8192  f3cd		       85 40		      sta	rand
   8193  f3cf		       45 41		      eor	rand16
   8194  f3d1		       60		      rts
   8195  f3d2
   8196  f3d2							; *** bcd conversion routine courtesy Omegamatrix
   8197  f3d2							; *** http://atariage.com/forums/blog/563/entry-10832-hex-to-bcd-conversion-0-99/
   8198  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_converttobcd
   8199  f3d2				  -converttobcd
   8200  f3d2				  -			;value to convert is in the accumulator
   8201  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp1
   8202  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   8203  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   8204  f3d2				  -	      ror
   8205  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   8206  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   8207  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   8208  f3d2				  -	      ror
   8209  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   8210  f3d2				  -	      ror
   8211  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   8212  f3d2				  -	      and	#$3C
   8213  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   8214  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   8215  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp2
   8216  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   8217  f3d2				  -	      rts		; return the result in the accumulator
   8218  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_converttobcd
   8219  f3d2
   8220  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul8
   8221  f3d2				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in A
   8222  f3d2				  -mul8
   8223  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   8224  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   8225  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
   8226  f3d2				  -reptmul8
   8227  f3d2				  -	      lsr	temp2
   8228  f3d2				  -	      bcc	skipmul8
   8229  f3d2				  -	      clc
   8230  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   8231  f3d2				  -			;bcs donemul8 might save cycles?
   8232  f3d2				  -skipmul8
   8233  f3d2				  -			;beq donemul8 might save cycles?
   8234  f3d2				  -	      asl	temp1
   8235  f3d2				  -	      bne	reptmul8
   8236  f3d2				  -donemul8
   8237  f3d2				  -	      rts
   8238  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul8
   8239  f3d2
   8240  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div8
   8241  f3d2				  -div8
   8242  f3d2				  -			; A=numerator Y=denominator, result in A
   8243  f3d2				  -	      cpy	#2
   8244  f3d2				  -	      bcc	div8end+1	;div by 0 = bad, div by 1=no calc needed, so bail out
   8245  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   8246  f3d2				  -	      ldy	#$ff
   8247  f3d2				  -div8loop
   8248  f3d2				  -	      sbc	temp1
   8249  f3d2				  -	      iny
   8250  f3d2				  -	      bcs	div8loop
   8251  f3d2				  -div8end
   8252  f3d2				  -	      tya
   8253  f3d2				  -			; result in A
   8254  f3d2				  -	      rts
   8255  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_div8
   8256  f3d2
   8257  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul16
   8258  f3d2				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in temp2,A=low, temp1=high
   8259  f3d2				  -mul16
   8260  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   8261  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   8262  f3d2				  -
   8263  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
   8264  f3d2				  -	      ldx	#8
   8265  f3d2				  -	      lsr	temp1
   8266  f3d2				  -mul16_1
   8267  f3d2				  -	      bcc	mul16_2
   8268  f3d2				  -	      clc
   8269  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp2
   8270  f3d2				  -mul16_2
   8271  f3d2				  -	      ror
   8272  f3d2				  -	      ror	temp1
   8273  f3d2				  -	      dex
   8274  f3d2				  -	      bne	mul16_1
   8275  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   8276  f3d2				  -	      rts
   8277  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul16
   8278  f3d2
   8279  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div16
   8280  f3d2				  -			; div int/int
   8281  f3d2				  -			; numerator in A, denom in temp1
   8282  f3d2				  -			; returns with quotient in A, remainder in temp1
   8283  f3d2				  -div16
   8284  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   8285  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   8286  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
   8287  f3d2				  -	      ldx	#8
   8288  f3d2				  -	      asl	temp2
   8289  f3d2				  -div16_1
   8290  f3d2				  -	      rol
   8291  f3d2				  -	      cmp	temp1
   8292  f3d2				  -	      bcc	div16_2
   8293  f3d2				  -	      sbc	temp1
   8294  f3d2				  -div16_2
   8295  f3d2				  -	      rol	temp2
   8296  f3d2				  -	      dex
   8297  f3d2				  -	      bne	div16_1
   8298  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp1
   8299  f3d2				  -	      lda	temp2
   8300  f3d2				  -	      rts
   8301  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_div16
   8302  f3d2
   8303  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode
   8304  f3d2				  -BS_jsr
   8305  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
   8306  f3d2				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
   8307  f3d2				  -	      endif
   8308  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
   8309  f3d2				  -	      ora	#$18
   8310  f3d2				  -	      sta	$3000
   8311  f3d2				  -	      else
   8312  f3d2				  -	      sta	$8000
   8313  f3d2				  -	      endif
   8314  f3d2				  -	      pla
   8315  f3d2				  -	      tax
   8316  f3d2				  -	      pla

   8318  f3d2				  -

   8321  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
   8322  f3d2				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
   8323  f3d2				  -	      endif
   8324  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	BANKRAM
   8325  f3d2				  -	      sta	currentbank
   8326  f3d2				  -	      ora	currentrambank
   8327  f3d2				  -	      endif
   8328  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
   8329  f3d2				  -	      ora	#$18
   8330  f3d2				  -	      sta	$3000
   8331  f3d2				  -	      else
   8332  f3d2				  -	      sta	$8000
   8333  f3d2				  -	      endif
   8334  f3d2				  -	      pla		; bankswitch $0 flag

   8336  f3d2					      endif

   8341  f3d7				   checkselectswitchreturn

   8346  f3db		       29 01		      and	#%00000001
   8347  f3dd		       60		      rts
   8348  f3de
   8349  f3de				  -	      ifconst	FINESCROLLENABLED
   8350  f3de				  -finescrolldlls
   8351  f3de				  -	      ldx	temp1	; first DLL index x3
   8352  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8353  f3de				  -	      and	#%11110000
   8354  f3de				  -	      ora	finescrolly
   8355  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8356  f3de				  -
   8357  f3de				  -	      ldx	temp2	; last DLL index x3
   8358  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8359  f3de				  -	      and	#%11110000
   8360  f3de				  -	      ora	finescrolly
   8361  f3de				  -	      eor	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)
   8362  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8363  f3de				  -	      rts
   8364  f3de					      endif		; FINESCROLLENABLED
   8365  f3de
   8366  f3de				  -	      ifconst	USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE
   8367  f3de				  -adjustvisible
   8368  f3de				  -			; called with temp1=first visible zone *3, temp2=last visible zone *3
   8369  f3de				  -	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
   8370  f3de				  -	      ldx	visibleDLLstart
   8371  f3de				  -findfirstinterrupt
   8372  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8373  f3de				  -	      bmi	foundfirstinterrupt
   8374  f3de				  -	      inx
   8375  f3de				  -	      inx
   8376  f3de				  -	      inx
   8377  f3de				  -	      bne	findfirstinterrupt
   8378  f3de				  -foundfirstinterrupt
   8379  f3de				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
   8380  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8381  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8382  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8383  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8384  f3de				  -	      ldx	overscanDLLstart
   8385  f3de				  -findlastinterrupt
   8386  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8387  f3de				  -	      bmi	foundlastinterrupt
   8388  f3de				  -	      dex
   8389  f3de				  -	      dex
   8390  f3de				  -	      dex
   8391  f3de				  -	      bne	findlastinterrupt
   8392  f3de				  -foundlastinterrupt
   8393  f3de				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
   8394  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8395  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8396  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8397  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8398  f3de				  -			;now we need to set the new interrupts
   8399  f3de				  -	      clc
   8400  f3de				  -	      lda	temp1
   8401  f3de				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
   8402  f3de				  -	      tax
   8403  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8404  f3de				  -	      ora	#%10000000
   8405  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8406  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8407  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8408  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8409  f3de				  -	      clc
   8410  f3de				  -	      lda	temp2
   8411  f3de				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
   8412  f3de				  -	      tax
   8413  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8414  f3de				  -	      ora	#%10000000
   8415  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8416  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8417  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8418  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8419  f3de				  -	      jsr	vblankresync
   8420  f3de				  -	      rts
   8421  f3de					      endif		; USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE
   8422  f3de
   8423  f3de				   vblankresync
   8424  f3de		       20 4e f4 	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
   8425  f3e1		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   8426  f3e3		       85 4d		      sta	visibleover
   8427  f3e5		       a9 03		      lda	#3
   8428  f3e7		       8d b2 01 	      sta	interruptindex
   8429  f3ea		       60		      rts
   8430  f3eb
   8431  f3eb				   createallgamedlls
   8432  f3eb		       a0 3c		      ldy	#(DLLLUTEND-DLLLUT)
   8433  f3ed				   createallgamedllsloop
   8434  f3ed		       88		      dey
   8435  f3ee		       b9 12 f4 	      lda	DLLLUT,y
   8436  f3f1		       99 00 18 	      sta	DLLMEM,y
   8437  f3f4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8438  f3f4				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,y
   8439  f3f4					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8440  f3f4		       c0 00		      cpy	#0
   8441  f3f6		       d0 f5		      bne	createallgamedllsloop
   8442  f3f8
   8443  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8444  f3f8				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
   8445  f3f8				  -fixdoublebuffer
   8446  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8447  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8448  f3f8				  -	      clc
   8449  f3f8				  -	      adc	#DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET
   8450  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8451  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8452  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8453  f3f8				  -	      adc	#0
   8454  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8455  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8456  f3f8				  -	      bne	fixdoublebuffer
   8457  f3f8					      endif
   8458  f3f8
   8459  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM
   8460  f3f8				  -			; N.B. banksets doesn't in-fact allow DL in cart-ram, so this conditional
   8461  f3f8				  -			; is always skipped. This is here in case some day the limitation is
   8462  f3f8				  -			; worked around, but it's untested.
   8463  f3f8				  -
   8464  f3f8				  -			; With bankset cart ram, we added $8000 to the DL address so plot
   8465  f3f8				  -			; functions would hit the cart-ram write-address. We need to subtract $80
   8466  f3f8				  -			; so Maria will read from the cart-ram read-address.
   8467  f3f8				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
   8468  f3f8				  -fixbanksetaddresses
   8469  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8470  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8471  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8472  f3f8				  -	      and	#%01111111
   8473  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8474  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8475  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8476  f3f8				  -	      and	#%01111111
   8477  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8478  f3f8				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8479  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8480  f3f8				  -	      bne	fixbanksetaddresses
   8481  f3f8					      endif		; BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM
   8482  f3f8
   8483  f3f8		       ad 09 21 	      lda	paldetected
   8484  f3fb		       f0 0a		      beq	skippaladjust

   8621  f457				  -	      endif

   8623  f457				  -	      beq	flipdisplaybufferreturn	; exit if we're not in double-buffer
   8624  f457				  -

   8626  f457				  -
   8627  f457				  -			; ensure we don't flip mid-display. otherwise the displayed DL will be the one the game is working on.
   8628  f457				  -

   8640  f457				  -	      tax
   8641  f457				  -
   8642  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferminimumframetarget

   8644  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferminimumframeindex

   8646  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferminimumframetarget

   8654  f457				  -

   8661  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferbufferdirty
   8662  f457				  -	      beq	flipdisplaybufferreturn
   8663  f457				  -
   8664  f457				  -			; The doublebuffer buffer is dirty, so the game code must have issued a savescreen recently.
   8665  f457				  -			; To make savescreen work with the new working buffer, we need to copy over the saved objects
   8666  f457				  -			; from the displayed buffer to the working buffer...

   8669  f457				  -	      eor	#DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET
   8670  f457				  -	      sta	temp6	; make temp6 the anti-doublebufferdloffset variable

   8680  f457				  -	      adc	#0
   8681  f457				  -	      sta	temp2
   8682  f457				  -

   8685  f457				  -	      adc	temp6
   8686  f457				  -	      sta	temp3

   8725  f457				  -	      ifconst	MOUSESUPPORT
   8726  f457				  -
   8727  f457				  -rotationalcompare
   8728  f457				  -			; old = 00 01 10 11
   8729  f457				  -	      .byte	$00, $01, $ff, $00	; new=00
   8730  f457				  -	      .byte	$ff, $00, $00, $01	; new=01
   8731  f457				  -	      .byte	$01, $00, $00, $ff	; new=10
   8732  f457				  -	      .byte	$00, $ff, $01, $00	; new=11
   8733  f457				  -
   8734  f457				  -			; 0000YyXx st mouse
   8735  f457				  -
   8736  f457				  -			; 0000xyXY amiga mouse
   8737  f457				  -
   8738  f457				  -	      ifconst	MOUSEXONLY
   8739  f457				  -amigatoataribits		; swap bits 1 and 4...
   8740  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0000, %0010, %0010
   8741  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0000, %0010, %0010
   8742  f457				  -	      .byte	%0001, %0001, %0011, %0011
   8743  f457				  -	      .byte	%0001, %0001, %0011, %0011
   8744  f457				  -

   8746  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
   8747  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
   8748  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
   8749  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
   8750  f457				  -
   8751  f457				  -	      else		; !MOUSEXONLY
   8752  f457				  -
   8753  f457				  -amigatoataribits		; swap bits 1 and 4...
   8754  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %1000, %0010, %1010
   8755  f457				  -	      .byte	%0100, %1100, %0110, %1110
   8756  f457				  -	      .byte	%0001, %1001, %0011, %1011
   8757  f457				  -	      .byte	%0101, %1101, %0111, %1111
   8758  f457				  -			; null change bits
   8759  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011
   8760  f457				  -	      .byte	%0100, %0101, %0110, %0111
   8761  f457				  -	      .byte	%1000, %1001, %1010, %1011
   8762  f457				  -	      .byte	%1100, %1101, %1110, %1111
   8763  f457				  -	      endif		; !MOUSEXONLY
